00273 {
00274     var frame = [_subviews[anIndex] frame],
00275         startPosition = frame.origin[_originComponent] + frame.size[_sizeComponent],
00276         effectiveRect = [self effectiveRectOfDividerAtIndex:anIndex],
00277         additionalRect = null;
00278     
00279     if ([_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(splitView:effectiveRect:forDrawnRect:ofDividerAtIndex:)])
00280         effectiveRect = [_delegate splitView:self effectiveRect:effectiveRect forDrawnRect:effectiveRect ofDividerAtIndex:anIndex];
00281     
00282     if ([_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(splitView:additionalEffectiveRectOfDividerAtIndex:)])
00283         additionalRect = [_delegate splitView:self additionalEffectiveRectOfDividerAtIndex:anIndex];
00284 
00285     return CGRectContainsPoint(effectiveRect, aPoint) || (additionalRect && CGRectContainsPoint(additionalRect, aPoint));
00286 }

- (void) resizeSubviewsWithOldSize: (CPSize)  oldSize   [implementation]

Definition at line 462 of file CPSplitView.j.

00462                                  :(CPSize)oldSize
00463 {   
00464     if ([_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(splitView:resizeSubviewsWithOldSize:)])
00465     {
00466         [_delegate splitView:self resizeSubviewsWithOldSize:oldSize];
00467         return;
00468     }
00469 
00470     [self _postNotificationWillResize];
00471     
00472     var index = 0,
00473         count = [_subviews count],
00474         bounds = [self bounds],
00475         dividerThickness = [self dividerThickness],
00476         totalDividers = count - 1,
00477         totalSizableSpace = 0,
00478         nonSizableSpace = 0,
00479         lastSizableIndex = -1,
00480         totalSizablePanes = 0,
00481         isVertical = [self isVertical];
00482 
00483     for (index = 0; index < count; ++index)
00484     {
00485         var view = _subviews[index],
00486             isSizable = isVertical ? [view autoresizingMask] & CPViewWidthSizable : [view autoresizingMask] & CPViewHeightSizable;
00487 
00488         if (isSizable)
00489         {
00490             totalSizableSpace += [view frame].size[_sizeComponent];
00491             lastSizableIndex = index;
00492             totalSizablePanes++;
00493         }
00494     }
00495 
00496     if (totalSizablePanes === count)
00497         totalSizableSpace = 0;
00498 
00499     var nonSizableSpace = totalSizableSpace ? bounds.size[_sizeComponent] - totalSizableSpace : 0,
00500         remainingFlexibleSpace = bounds.size[_sizeComponent] - oldSize[_sizeComponent],
00501         oldDimension = (oldSize[_sizeComponent]- totalDividers*dividerThickness - nonSizableSpace),
00502         ratio = oldDimension <= 0 ? 0 : (bounds.size[_sizeComponent] - totalDividers*dividerThickness - nonSizableSpace) / oldDimension;
00503 
00504     for (index = 0; index < count; ++index)
00505     {
00506         var view = _subviews[index],
00507             viewFrame = CGRectMakeCopy(bounds),
00508             isSizable = isVertical ? [view autoresizingMask] & CPViewWidthSizable : [view autoresizingMask] & CPViewHeightSizable;
00509 
00510             if (index + 1 == count)
00511                 viewFrame.size[_sizeComponent] = bounds.size[_sizeComponent] - viewFrame.origin[_originComponent];
00512             else if (totalSizableSpace && isSizable && lastSizableIndex === index)
00513                 viewFrame.size[_sizeComponent] = MAX(0, ROUND([view frame].size[_sizeComponent] + remainingFlexibleSpace))
00514             else if (isSizable || !totalSizableSpace)
00515             {
00516                 viewFrame.size[_sizeComponent] = MAX(0, ROUND(ratio * [view frame].size[_sizeComponent]));
00517                 remainingFlexibleSpace -= (viewFrame.size[_sizeComponent] - [view frame].size[_sizeComponent]);
00518             }
00519             else if (totalSizableSpace && !isSizable)
00520                 viewFrame.size[_sizeComponent] = [view frame].size[_sizeComponent];
00521 
00522         bounds.origin[_originComponent] += viewFrame.size[_sizeComponent] + dividerThickness;        
00523 
00524         [view setFrame:viewFrame];
00525     }
00526 
00527     [self _postNotificationDidResize];
00528 }

00421         actualMax = proposedMax,
00422         actualMin = proposedMin;
00423         
00424     if([_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(splitView:constrainMinCoordinate:ofSubviewAt:)])

00434         frameB = [viewB frame];
00435

00437

00440             if ([_delegate splitView:self canCollapseSubview:viewA])
00441                 realPosition = proposedMin;
00442     
00443     frameA.size[_sizeComponent] = realPosition - frameA.origin[_originComponent];
00444     [_subviews[dividerIndex] setFrame:frameA];
00445     
00446     frameB.size[_sizeComponent] = frameB.origin[_originComponent] + frameB.size[_sizeComponent] - realPosition - [self dividerThickness];
00447     frameB.origin[_originComponent] = realPosition + [self dividerThickness];
00448     [_subviews[dividerIndex + 1] setFrame:frameB];
00449     
00450     [self setNeedsDisplay:YES];

- (void) setVertical: (BOOL)  shouldBeVertical   [implementation]

Definition at line 97 of file CPSplitView.j.

00097                    :(BOOL)shouldBeVertical
00098 {
00099     if (![self _setVertical:shouldBeVertical])
00100         return;
00101     
00102     // Just re-adjust evenly.
00103     var frame = [self frame],
00104         dividerThickness = [self dividerThickness];
00105     
00106     [self _postNotificationWillResize];
00107     
00108     var eachSize = ROUND((frame.size[_sizeComponent] - dividerThickness * (_subviews.length - 1)) / _subviews.length),
00109         index = 0,
00110         count = _subviews.length;
00111 
00112     if ([self isVertical])
00113         for (; index < count; ++index)
00114             [_subviews[index] setFrame:CGRectMake(ROUND((eachSize + dividerThickness) * index), 0, eachSize, frame.size.height)];
00115     else
00116         for (; index < count; ++index)
00117             [_subviews[index] setFrame:CGRectMake(0, ROUND((eachSize + dividerThickness) * index), frame.size.width, eachSize)];
00118     
00119     [self setNeedsDisplay:YES];
00120     
00121     [self _postNotificationDidResize];
00122 
00123 }

- (void) trackDivider: (CPEvent)  anEvent   [implementation]

Definition at line 309 of file CPSplitView.j.

00309                     :(CPEvent)anEvent
00310 {
00311     var type = [anEvent type];
00312 
00313     if (type == CPLeftMouseUp)
00314     {
00315         if (_currentDivider != CPNotFound)
00316         {
00317             _currentDivider = CPNotFound;
00318             [self _postNotificationDidResize];
00319         }
00320         
00321         return;
00322     }
00323     
00324     if (type == CPLeftMouseDown)
00325     {
00326         var point = [self convertPoint:[anEvent locationInWindow] fromView:nil];
00327 
00328         _currentDivider = CPNotFound;
00329         var count = [_subviews count] - 1;
00330         for (var i = 0; i < count; i++)
00331         {
00332             var frame = [_subviews[i] frame],
00333                 startPosition = frame.origin[_originComponent] + frame.size[_sizeComponent];
00334 
00335             if ([self cursorAtPoint:point hitDividerAtIndex:i])
00336             {
00337                 if ([anEvent clickCount] == 2 &&
00338                     [_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(splitView:canCollapseSubview:)] &&
00339                     [_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(splitView:shouldCollapseSubview:forDoubleClickOnDividerAtIndex:)])
00340                 {    
00341                     var minPosition = [self minPossiblePositionOfDividerAtIndex:i],
00342                         maxPosition = [self maxPossiblePositionOfDividerAtIndex:i];
00343 
00344                     if ([_delegate splitView:self canCollapseSubview:_subviews[i]] && [_delegate splitView:self shouldCollapseSubview:_subviews[i] forDoubleClickOnDividerAtIndex:i])
00345                     {
00346                         if ([self isSubviewCollapsed:_subviews[i]])
00347                             [self setPosition:(minPosition + (maxPosition - minPosition) / 2) ofDividerAtIndex:i];
00348                         else
00349                             [self setPosition:minPosition ofDividerAtIndex:i];
00350                     }
00351                     else if ([_delegate splitView:self canCollapseSubview:_subviews[i+1]] && [_delegate splitView:self shouldCollapseSubview:_subviews[i+1] forDoubleClickOnDividerAtIndex:i])
00352                     {
00353                         if ([self isSubviewCollapsed:_subviews[i+1]])
00354                             [self setPosition:(minPosition + (maxPosition - minPosition) / 2) ofDividerAtIndex:i];
00355                         else
00356                             [self setPosition:maxPosition ofDividerAtIndex:i];
00357                     }
00358                 }
00359                 else
00360                 {
00361                     _currentDivider = i;
00362                     _initialOffset = startPosition - point[_originComponent];
00363 
00364                     [self _postNotificationWillResize];
00365                 }
00366             }
00367         }
00368 
00369         if (_currentDivider === CPNotFound)
00370             return;
00371     }
00372     
00373     else if (type == CPLeftMouseDragged && _currentDivider != CPNotFound)
00374     {
00375         var point = [self convertPoint:[anEvent locationInWindow] fromView:nil];
00376         
00377         [self setPosition:(point[_originComponent] + _initialOffset) ofDividerAtIndex:_currentDivider];
00378     }
00379     
00380     [CPApp setTarget:self selector:@selector(trackDivider:) forNextEventMatchingMask:CPLeftMouseDraggedMask | CPLeftMouseUpMask untilDate:nil inMode:nil dequeue:YES];
00381 }
